subject: Automobile Racing
lead_paragraph: Takuma Sato won the pole in St. Petersburg, Fla., for Sunday’s season-opening IndyCar Series race. Tony Kanaan qualified second, 0.2951 seconds behind.
snippet: Takuma Sato won the pole in St. Petersburg, Fla., for Sunday’s season-opening IndyCar Series race. Tony Kanaan qualified second, 0.2951 seconds behind.
